title: GOOD BYE USELESS EMPLOYEES =)
body:
I run a small restaurant and the city put in a 15$ min wage and half my employees were protesting for it. So when the wage hike kicks in I'm only keeping the employees that have been productive and they were the ones that were working during the protests since they are VALUABLE employees and on the day the wage goes up  and the ones that were not doing their job and not showing up are being shown the door and that day is tomorow
I love that my state has a RTW policy
